sentences.sContent: My daughter is very difficult, uncommunicative and moody.
sentences.sCn: 我女儿很难对付，她不爱说话而且喜怒无常。

remMethod.val: 与incommunicative(adj. 不爱交际的， 沉默寡言的)一起记

trans.tranCn: 不爱说话的， 拘谨的
trans.tranOther: If you describe someone as uncommunicative, you are critical of them because they do not talk to other people very much and are unwilling to express opinions or give information
